item.name: matches
item.description: A box, appearing as any other box of matches you are accustomed to from your world. On the front, the box shows a warning, but the meaning isn't quite clear. The picture shows an all black match lighting a candle, a plus sign, and circular lines that appear to be wind.

item.name: candle
item.lockMessage: You strike a match, setting the candle aflame. Like a hurricane, wind gusts around you, lifting your feet from the ground. With just a blink, you have moved to a new room, barely catching your footing as the wind disappears.

item.name: lizard key
item.description: Long and heavy, rusted on a lizard's belly. A key of this shape must be used for an escape. Find your own entry, the alternative could be deadly.
